item.title: Generate the sitemap of a Ghost blog during deploy
item.description: Waiting for a sitemap generator inside the core of Ghost (planned as “future implementation”) I decided to implement a way to generate an up-to-date sitemap.xml during deployment. As you can read in the previous post I’m deploying this blog with Capistrano and capistrano-node-deploy. So I added a deploy:generate_sitemap task which is executed at the end of the deployment process. This is the Capfile extract: namespace :deploy do task :generate_sitemap do run "cd #{latest_release}&& .
